details:
Multiple vulnerabilities were fixed in imagemagick, a software suite,
used for editing and manipulating digital images.


* [CVE-2021-20176](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-20176)
A divide by zero was found in gem.c file.
* [CVE-2021-20241](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-20241)
A divide by zero was found in jp2 coder.
* [CVE-2021-20243](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-20243)
A divide by zero was found in dcm coder.
* [CVE-2021-20244](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-20244)
A divide by zero was found in fx.c.
* [CVE-2021-20245](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-20245)
A divide by zero was found in webp coder.
* [CVE-2021-20246](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-20246)
A divide by zero was found in resample.c.
* [CVE-2021-20309](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-20309)
A divide by zero was found in WaveImage.c
* [CVE-2021-20312](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-20312)
An integer overflow was found in WriteTHUMBNAILImage()
 of coders/thumbnail.c
* [CVE-2021-20313](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-20313)
A potential cipher leak was found when the calculate
 signatures in TransformSignature().
* [CVE-2021-39212](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-39212)
A policy bypass was found for postscript files.
* [CVE-2022-28463](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2022-28463)
A bufer overflow was found in buffer overflow in cin coder.
* [CVE-2022-32545](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2022-32545)
A undefined behavior (conversion outside the range of
 representable values of type unsigned char) was found in psd
 file handling.
* [CVE-2022-32546](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2022-32546)
A undefined behavior (conversion outside the range of
 representable values of type long) was found in pcl
 file handling.
* [CVE-2022-32547](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2022-32547)
An unaligned access was found in property.c


For Debian 10 buster, these problems have been fixed in version
8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1+deb10u5.


We recommend that you upgrade your imagemagick packages.


For the detailed security status of imagemagick please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/imagemagick>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
